slide_1_cover.subtitle: Proposal for Cloud ERP & Analytics Platform

slide_2_executive_summary.title: Executive Summary
slide_2_executive_summary.body: Acme Corp faces critical operational challenges with legacy systems causing 20% slower order-to-delivery cycles. Our proposed solution delivers a modern cloud ERP with real-time analytics, enabling data-driven decisions and operational excellence. Expected outcome: 30% improvement in cycle times within 6 months.

slide_3_client_context.title: Client Context
slide_3_client_context.body_left:
Company Profile:
- Manufacturing sector
- 500 employees
- €50M annual revenue
- 200+ system users
slide_3_client_context.body_right:
Key Stakeholders:
- CTO (Decision Maker)
- VP Engineering (Champion)
- CFO (Budget Holder)

slide_4_challenges.title: Current Challenges
slide_4_challenges.body:
1. Legacy ERP causing production delays
2. Manual Excel reporting (15 hrs/week)
3. No real-time dashboards
4. Risk of losing key accounts
5. Complex data migration concerns

slide_5_proposed_solution.title: Our Solution
slide_5_proposed_solution.subtitle: End-to-End Digital Transformation
slide_5_proposed_solution.body: A comprehensive cloud ERP migration with integrated analytics platform, designed specifically for manufacturing operations.

slide_6_solution_scope.title: Solution Scope
slide_6_solution_scope.body:
Core Components:
- Cloud ERP implementation
- Real-time analytics dashboards
- Automated reporting engine
- Mobile access for floor managers
- Data migration & validation

slide_7_implementation.body_left:

- Quick wins identification
slide_7_implementation.body_right:
Phase 2-3 (18 weeks):

- Analytics layer
- User training
